title: Alex Neil – 2012 Speech to SNP Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Alex Neil at the 2012 SNP Party Conference on 21st October 2012.
content:
Just two of her achievements have been keeping the Accident and Emergency Departments at Ayr and Monklands open; and introducing free prescriptions for everybody in Scotland.
